title: Hi i'm Derek 'Raydere' Trang, ADC for the Chiefs eSports Club. Ask me almost anything!
body:
Hey guys,

From 5pm AEST onwards, ill be answering questions tonight and tomorrow night as well. Feel free to post on anything related to league, life or topics of your most creative imagination.

Short Bio:

I'm currently 22 years old and studying Commerce & Law at the University of New South Wales (UNSW).
I've been playing league since 2011 and have been pretty much on the same team throughout (With rosters changing around me).
Currently rank 1 on the Oceanic Server, i peaked at rank 20 on season 2 on NA and D1 99 points season 3 just before the OCE servers came out.

Whilst that pretty much sums up my public life, hobbies that i enjoy outside of league include cooking (Yes i love being a chef), exercising, playing poker and reading books related to sociology, philosophy or astronomy. 

I'm posting this an hour early to start collecting questions and you guys can upvote the questions you most want the answers to, so post away!


Facebook fan page: https://www.facebook.com/rayder123?ref=hl
Twitter:                      https://twitter.com/RaydereOfficial

replies.body: how would you suggest for someone to get better at this game gg
Have hilarious names.
This guy is gay 4 u as u can tell xD
lel nice name : ^)
Hey man, i would love to know how often you give your support the credit for the kills you guys get?

???

When i get kills bot lane its a 1v2. I don't have a support.

Ty for AMA!
How do you manage to work around a challenger solo queue schedule, a competitive league schedule and a university schedule? Would you be able to post a brief summary of what your average  day would look like? I ask this mainly coz you're undertaking one of most competitive degrees in Australia and to be the best league player OCE simultaneously is a pretty neat achievement :)
Tell us about the best sandwich you've ever made.
Bacon, Steak, Bacon and tomato sauce.

R u the best, and simply better than all the rest?
Simply the best?

<3
Better than anyone, anyone i've ever met.
Do you know the muffinman?
Yes i love muffins.
"Would you rather fight one horse sized duck or one-hundred duck sized horses?" - not OC <3
One horse sized duck, I'm too lazy to fight 100 duck sized horses.
How does it feel to know you are vastly inferior to the god that is VengeanceLX {{champion:254}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}
Who's VengeanceLX?
VengeanceLX is probs this guys main account ROFL
Where are there more asians? In asia itself or in the commerce/law program at UNSW?
I think the commerce / law program at UNSW is actually considered Chinese soil somehow.
why is my lolking score 890x better than yours
Because your imagination is 890x stronger than mine.
Why do you never accept my invites? :C i Cri{{item:3070}}
Because my teammates want me all to themselves :(.
if you're the father of the team (quote from swip3rR) who is the uncle that cracks the bad jokes and who is the child?
I crack the bad jokes and there are three children on the team (Spookz Swiffer and Swip3rr).

Any comment on the skill disparity between OCE and other regions? I don't think that there is much of a skill gap until you get to the high diamond / challenger range but I think I'm a bit biased because I wouldn't touch 150 ping with a ten foot pole.

Thanks. :^)

I think that the top players from OCE can compete with the top players from other regions reasonably well.

However, the difference is that there's just less players at every skill level for OCE. For instance I would say that the top 10 challengers on OCE would be equivalent to the top 30 challengers in NA or EU. Perhaps top 100 for Korea or China.

I sat next to you at Melbourne ACL and didn't realise it was you :( I remember you playing support blitzcrank as you were vsing my friends team consisting of golds etc. 
Anyway do you believe that an OCE team can make worlds in the next 1-2 years??
And how long do you think that League will remain a relevant esport?

Yes i believe its very possible that an OCE team can make worlds this year as well.
I think League will remain relevant for quite a while, its structure with the LCS as well as tournament formats such as worlds have actually given it a lot of longevity due to catering to people who like to follow casually and not just play. 

So well played Riot, well played.
What are you currently wearing?
Chiefs hoodie and sweat pants! Although I don't wear anything when i go to sleep ^_^

That escalated quickly.
Let's talk about Raydere not wearing anything when he goes to sleep! :D
Oh you ;)
Ahahah ;)
Is it true you're an ex state champion in chess?
Technically yes.
Worst champions in solo q?
Rengar, because i hate that champion.
what are the chances of being able to play 1 game with you, like even if its a bot match or something stupid?
If you get to challenger, very high.

I was in an ARAM with you a month or two ago. I wasn't ranked (still not) and finished last season in Gold 5. But the queue was about 4-5 minutes long, which widens the criteria. I was pretty happy about that. Just queue up for ARAMs at 7 in the morning like me, it will work like magic. Also depends on if Raydere still plays ARAM.

You should move to mid-lane, because all I remember is that your Orianna ults were amazing.
Any good marksman ?? and tip on howto be good as adc   because i want to main adc :D {{champion:119}}
Can You tell me some tips about adcing and how to carry better as most the times my teams feed??? and how are you so good at adc like i watch you play in solo  q and geez man ur kalista 10/10
Kiting, don't dive their carries, its overrated unless there's a very obvious opening.
Do you play Pokemon? If so, what would you be taking to my gym to challenge me for my badge?

I haven't played Pokemon for probably more than a decade.
However, my Alakazam will destroy you.

When are you changing your name to chef raydere instead of chief raydere?

Out of all the professional LoL teams, who do you want to play against the most?

Look at rank 1 on oce :).

I would want to play against EDG the most or OMG, just to play against deft or uzi.

About the incident when you were playing twitch last year at PAX. Do you know what happened? Why did the tower aggro you?

Also, you have a great mentality when playing. I love it. One thing I want to know is it okay to go AV.Blade in SoloQ? 

Love yah. Long time fan.
